tool_description: Generates precise timing information for speech synthesis including word boundaries, phoneme durations, and pause timing for synchronization applications.

timing_precision.description: Timing granularity: phoneme, syllable, word, or sentence

error_messages: Invalid timing precision: Use phoneme, syllable, word, or sentence.
Voice profile not found: Specified voice profile does not exist.
Timeline generation failed: Unable to generate timing information.
Text too complex: Simplify text structure for timeline generation.
usage: Provide input_text and voice_profile_id. Set timing_precision for granularity and include_pauses for pause timing. Returns detailed speech timeline data.

timeline_data.description: Timing information for each speech unit

total_duration.description: Total estimated speech duration in seconds

word_boundaries.description: Start times for each word in seconds
